entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as being on the edge of his seat and looking desperate to start proving that he isn't a dunderhead.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend, also a student at Hogwarts. He is described as being stumped along with Harry when asked by Snape about the powdered root of asphodel.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and one of Harry's friends. She is described as being on the edge of her seat, looking desperate to start proving that she isn't a dunderhead.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts and is known for his sneering behavior. He asks Harry questions about the powdered root of asphodel and a bezoar.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts and is described as shaking with laughter along with Crabbe and Goyle when Harry doesn't know the answer to Snape's question.

relationships.description: Snape asks Harry a series of questions about the powdered root of asphodel and a bezoar.
Hermione tries to answer Snape's question about the powdered root of asphodel, but Harry doesn't know the answer.
Harry is unaware of the answer to Snape's question and looks at Malfoy, who is shaking with laughter along with Crabbe and Goyle.
